text: Patiala Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 115) is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Patiala district, Punjab state, India. == Notable politicians == Notable politicians from Patiala constituency are Amarinder Singh, who is a Chief minister of Punjab, and his wife Preneet Kaur, who has held a number of portfolios in Govt. of India. ==Election Results 2017== == List of MLAs == Members of Punjab Legislative Assembly Patiala. {| class="wikitable" style="width:70%;" |- align="center" ! № !
